      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A melegített víz</string>
            <string language="en-US">Heated water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebhaftes Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau de chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água aquecida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua riscaldata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμαμένο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua calentada</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A nem, a kissé, és a jobban melegített víz párolgása egyre erősödik</string>
            <string language="en-US">The precipitation of the not, the slightly and the more heated water is gradually rising</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">víz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">melegítés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">halmazállapot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">párolgás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hőmérséklet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Niederschlag von nicht, etwas und vom 
lebhafteren Wasser steigt stufenweise</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La précipitation du pas, légèrement et de 
l'eau plus de chauffage se lève graduellement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A precipitação do não, ligeiramente e da água
mais aquecida está levantando-se gradualmente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La precipitazione non, un po'e dell'acqua 
riscaldata sta aumentando gradualmente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πτώση όχι, ελαφρώς και του θερμαμένου ύδατος 
αυξάνεται βαθμιαία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La precipitación del no, levemente y del agua 
calentada se está levantando gradualmente</string>
          </description>
        </general>
